data.name: Rogue
data.description: A Southern belle with the mutant power to drain her enemies through physical touch, Rogue tears down her foes' defenses and protects her allies.

starItems.name: Rogue
starItems.description: A Southern belle with the mutant power to drain her enemies through physical touch, Rogue tears down her foes' defenses and protects her allies.

1.description:
Clear all Barrier on the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
If primary target did not have Barrier, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

item.name: Rogue's Basic Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Clear all Barrier on the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
If primary target did not have Barrier, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> or Apocalypse allies, always Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance for each <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> or Apocalypse ally for this attack.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the primary target.
Reduce Speed Bar of the primary target by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy with the highest Speed Bar instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the primary target.
Reduce Speed Bar of the primary target by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy with the highest Speed Bar instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>

3.description:
Apply all of the following negative effects to the primary target: <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
Reduce Speed Bar of the primary target by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Gain all of the following positive effects: <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy with the highest Speed Bar instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target
Gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>

7.description:

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy with the highest Speed Bar instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

1.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies.

On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When an <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from self (<color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> prevents <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from being able to be cleared).

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance.

Clones of this character have reduced Max Health and Speed compared to standard Clones and they cannot reach maximum Ability Levels.
1.nextUpgrade:
At the end of this character's turn, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage
